sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function Terms() { return (

Terms & Conditions

Last Updated: August 12, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By creating an account or using BEAM’s services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you are acting on behalf of a company or organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that entity to this Agreement.

2. Eligibility

You must be 18 years or older and legally capable of entering into contracts. You must also comply with all applicable local, national, and international laws.

3. User Accounts & Verification

You must provide accurate, up-to-date information during registration. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.

4. Posting Projects

Clients may post projects with clear descriptions, timelines, and budgets. BEAM reserves the right to remove any content that violates policies or laws.

5. Proposal and Assignment

Service Providers may submit proposals for posted projects. Clients are responsible for reviewing proposals and making final hiring decisions.

6. Fees and Payments

BEAM may charge a platform service fee or subscription fee. All payments must be processed through BEAM’s payment system.

7. Communication Policy

All initial project communications must occur within BEAM’s messaging system. Sharing contact details to bypass BEAM is prohibited.

8. Data Privacy & Security

BEAM collects and processes personal data as per our Privacy Policy. Users must not attempt to hack, disrupt, or exploit the platform.

9. Limitation of Liability

BEAM is not a party to contracts between Clients and Service Providers. We are not liable for any losses, damages, or claims arising from user interactions.

10. Updates to Terms

BEAM may revise these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Platform after updates constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

); }
